item.description: Follow along with Gizmodo as we check out all the latest gadget announcements from the year's biggest, most-packed tech event, CES 2026.

item.title: Startup Satellite Hits 1,800 Degrees, Cooks Up Plasma in Orbit for the First Time
item.description: Space Forge is looking to manufacture semiconductor materials in orbit, where the microgravity enables cleaner crystals.

item.title: Y aura-t-il de nouveaux smartphones Asus en 2026 ? On a la réponse
item.description: Le fabricant Asus est plus connu pour ses ordinateurs ou ses consoles portables que pour ses smartphones. Certains les attendent au tournant cependant.

item.title: Tesla annual sales decline 9% as it’s overtaken by BYD as global EV leader
item.description: Tesla annual sales have fallen for the second year in a row, a drop fueled by the removal of the federal tax credit in the U.S. and competition from Chinese automakers.

item.title: The ‘Stranger Things’ Finale Already Told Us What the Spinoff Will Be About
item.description: One mysterious thread from the finale will provide an inroad for the future of 'Stranger Things'.

item.title: An extraordinary life comes down to these two choices
item.description: The secret sauce is a blend of focus and flexibility. After years of “career experiments,” two clear life paths stand out to me. Just two choices people make, sometimes without realising it. Decisions that define almost every area of our lives. The most successful people pick one of these paths early. And stick around long enough for it to work. Everything that follows grows from those two decisions. The work you do. The skills you build. And the doors that open for you. I’ve seen both work. Different roads. But they can all help you build the life you want. You don’t need to have it all figur...

item.title: Samsung launches reservation campaign for next-gen TVs ahead of CES 2026, complete with $100 store credit
item.description: Samsung's reservation campaign is back – this time on the brand's upcoming next-generation TVs, monitors, and home appliances.

item.title: Nvidia’s AI empire: A look at its top startup investments
item.description: Over the last two years, Nvidia has used its ballooning fortunes to invest in over 100 AI startups. Here are the giant semiconductor's largest investments.

item.title: Avis aux gamers, ce moniteur de 27″ (1440p et 180 Hz) qui tombe sous les 130 € est un super deal pour les petits budgets
item.description: Monter un PC, ces derniers temps, c’est souvent un sport de riche. Les composants flambent à cause des pénuries, les écrans suivent, et l’addition pique vite. Mais pour éviter la débauche tarifaire, il suffit parfois d’ouvrir l’œil et de viser juste. Comme ce AOC Q27G4X, un moniteur solide, aux performances sérieuses, déjà bien placé sous les 200 €… et qui descend aujourd’hui à 129 € chez Cdiscount. ...

item.title: AI Slop won in 2025 — fingerprinting real content might be the answer in 2026
item.description: Forget identifying AI slop, 'Fingerprinting real media' could be 2026's hottest trend.

item.title: Grok, l’IA d’Elon Musk, a généré des images pédopornographiques
item.description: Après avoir généré des images sexualisées de mineurs, Grok a admis la faute et invoquer des « défaillances de ses garde-fous ». L’IA de xAI, imaginée par Elon Musk comme plus permissive et « anti-woke », a surtout rappelé (après coup…) que ces contenus sont illégaux. Un incident de plus qui met en lumière les limites des promesses de modération des outils d’IA générative....

item.title: The Clicks BlackBerry-Like Phone Keyboard Finally Makes Sense
item.description: Or, if you just want another BlackBerry, Clicks is also making a phone.

item.title: Trump’s new order delays tariff increases on kitchen cabinets and upholstered furniture
item.description: Trump’s December 31 proclamation delays the tariffs for a year. President Donald Trump signed a New Year’s Eve proclamation delaying increased tariffs on upholstered furniture, kitchen cabinets and vanities for a year, citing ongoing trade talks.Trump’s order signed Wednesday keeps in place a 25% tariff he imposed in September on those goods, but delays for another year a 30% tariff on upholstered furniture and 50% tariff on kitchen cabinets and vanities.The increases, which were set to take effect Jan. 1, come as the Republican president instituted a broad swath of taxes on imported goods to ...

item.title: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella is now blogging about AI slop
item.description: Now that Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella has appointed a new CEO to run Microsoft's biggest businesses, he has a little more time on his hands for other adventures. Beyond focusing on Microsoft's technical work, Nadella is now turning to the ancient art of blogging to discuss Microsoft's year ahead and why he thinks everyone needs […]

item.title: 2026 Is Poised to Be the Year of the Tech IPO. Will It Also Be the Year the AI Bubble Bursts?
item.description: SpaceX, OpenAI, Anthropic are all allegedly planning to raise eye-watering figures in market debuts.

item.title: Le Windows Phone à double écrans voit le jour (ou presque) 7 ans après son abandon par Microsoft
item.description: Grâce au travail d'un développeur, il est possible d'essayer le système d'exploitation Windows Phone pensé pour un appareil à deux écrans.

item.title: Amazon a attendu 2026 pour baisser le prix de l’Apple Watch Series 11 dans sa version 46 mm
item.description: Lancée en fin d'année dernière, l'Apple Watch Series 11 est arrivée avec quelques nouveautés intéressantes. C'est dans son format 46 mm qu'elle est actuellement plus recommandable : Amazon la propose à 449 euros au lieu de 479 euros. Soit le prix de lancement de la version 42 mm.

item.title: Nostalgie BlackBerry : Clicks dévoile le Communicator, un smartphone à clavier physique comme dans le bon vieux temps
item.description: Cela fait bien longtemps que les claviers physiques ont perdu la partie face aux écrans tactiles. Mais il existe toujours une curiosité — et même un véritable intérêt — autour de ces boutons bien réels, synonymes pour certains de confort de frappe et de productivité. La start-up Clicks entend bien raviver cette flamme avec le Communicator, un smartphone Android à clavier physique qui assume pleinement son positionnement à contre-courant....

item.title: This Beetle Is in a Toxic Relationship With a Tree. Luckily, They Know a Fungi
item.description: Three's a crowd: Tree, beetle, and fungus don't get along, but they're surviving together.

item.title: Mayor Mamdani pledges to govern NYC ‘expansively and audaciously’ in inaugural speech
item.description: Zohran Mamdani, New York City’s first Muslim mayor, was sworn in by Senator Bernie Sanders at a public inauguration. Zohran Mamdani became mayor of New York City on Thursday, taking over one of the most unrelenting jobs in American politics with a promise to transform government on behalf of the city’s striving, struggling working class.Mamdani, a Democrat, was sworn in at a decommissioned subway station below City Hall just after midnight, placing his hand on a Quran as he took his oath as the city’s first Muslim mayor.After working part of the night in his new office, Mamdani returned to Cit...

item.title: This smart fridge wants to solve the hassle of grocery shopping
item.description: Have you always wanted to scan your groceries at home? If so, the newest smart fridge from GE Appliances is for you. There's a barcode scanner built into the water dispenser that works along with an interior camera and an 8-inch tablet to help you keep track of what food you need and add it […]

item.title: Pebble’s round smartwatch is getting a reboot
item.description: It's time to reboot another OG Pebble smartwatch - specifically, the round-faced Time Round, which is getting a follow-up more than a decade after its original launch. The new Pebble Round 2 improves upon its predecessor with longer battery life and a larger 1.3-inch touchscreen display, ditching the chunky bezel that surrounded the original Time […]...

item.title: Pebble brings its round-faced smartwatch back from the dead
item.description: You’ve probably heard people say it’s impossible to go back and correct some error from the past. To those people, you should raise a middle finger in defiance (they are miserable, after all), and then point them to the tale of Pebble’s unlikely revival. The smartwatch pioneer’s return was a surprise of 2025, and now the company has resurrected one of its last great triumphs. It’s announcing the Pebble Round 2, and company founder Eric Migicovsky is looking to put right what once went wrong. The Pebble Round 2 is the successor to the Pebble Time Round, which debuted in 2015 to what can only b...

item.title: C’est l’événement astronomique de l’année 2026 : voici où et comment voir l’éclipse du Soleil
item.description: L’année 2026 nous réserve un événement astronomique majeur : le 12 août prochain aura en effet lieu une éclipse solaire presque totale pour la France métropolitaine ! Un moment à ne pas manquer. Voici donc ce qu’il faut savoir pour en profiter au maximum.

item.title: Tesla Loses Its EV Crown to BYD as Sales Keep Dropping
item.description: Full-year electric vehicle sales figures have dropped for 2025, revealing China’s BYD is now officially global top dog.

item.title: Engadget Podcast: Everything we expect at CES 2026
item.description: We’re gearing up for CES 2026! Engadget will be on the ground, once again, to dive into the latest TVs, wearables and other wild tech from the world’s biggest consumer electronics show. In this episode, we chat about some new products we expect to see, like Micro RGB LED TVs and AI devices, and peer into what’s ahead for the rest of 2026.Subscribe!iTunesSpotifyPocket CastsStitcherGoogle PodcastsCreditsHosts: Devindra HardawarProducer: Ben Ellman Music: Dale North and Terrence O'BrienThis article originally appeared on Engadget at https://www.engadget.com/social-media/engadget-podcast-everythin...

item.title: Why is Sprinkles Cupcakes closing? TikTok critics focus their ire on private equity as beloved bakery folds
item.description: Candace Nelson, founder of the brand known for its cupcake ATMs, received an interesting response when she asked people to share their memories. Sprinkles Cupcakes, the company known for its sweet treats and iconic cupcake ATMs, is no more.

item.title: In 2026, AI will move from hype to pragmatism
item.description: In 2026, here's what you can expect from the AI industry: new architectures, smaller models, world models, reliable agents, physical AI, and products designed for real-world use.

item.title: Tesla’s fourth quarter sales fell a lot more than expected
item.description: Tesla's sales fell in the fourth quarter of 2025, as rising competition and the expiration of the federal EV tax credit continued to sap the company's global ambitions. The numbers were a lot worse than many Wall Street analysts were expecting. The disappointing sales report raises the question whether Tesla can reverse its downward fortune […]
